## ğŸ“¥ Installation

1. ### ğŸš° Tap this repo

   ```shell
   brew tap 5ouma/cask-fonts
   ```

2. ### ğŸ”  Install preferred fonts

   - #### [ğŸ‘¾ BestTen](https://flop.fanbox.cc/posts/1918861)

     ```shell
     brew install font-bestten
     ```

   - #### ğŸŒ€ Giro

     ```shell
     brew install font-giro
     ```

   - #### [ğŸ˜€ Emoooji](https://rarapon.net/download/other/emoooji)

     ```shell
     brew install font-emoooji
     ```

   - #### [ğŸ–‹ï¸ Inkling](https://frozenpandaman.github.io/inkling.html)

     ```shell
     brew install font-inkling
     ```

   - #### [ğŸŒ± LINE Seed JP](https://seed.line.me)

     ```shell
     brew install font-line-seed-jp
     ```

   - #### [ğŸ¥¥ Natadecoco gothic](https://kashika-labo.com/natadecoco-gothic)

     ```shell
     brew install font-natadecoco-gothic
     ```

   - #### [ğŸŒ¼ ROLAchan](https://ozawa.design/store/rolachan)

     ```shell
     brew install font-rolachan
     ```

   - #### [ğŸ¦‘ Splatoon1](https://frozenpandaman.github.io/inkling.html)

     ```shell
     brew install font-splatoon1
     ```

   - #### [ğŸ¦‘ Splatoon2](https://frozenpandaman.github.io/inkling.html)
